remarks: Lemma for ~ amgm .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
statement:
amgm.1 $e |- M = ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) $.
amgm.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
amgm.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
amgm.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> RR+ ) $.
amgmlem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M gsum F ) ^c ( 1 / ( # ` A ) ) ) <_ ( ( CCfld gsum F ) / ( # ` A ) ) ) $.
